comments:
Eclipse 3.1, Mozilla 1.7.10-1.5.1 (FC4)

1. Open a .html file in the internal web browser.
2. Rename the file in the package explorer using Refactor > Rename.
3. Hit reload in the browser.

Eclipse dies with this message:

Unhandled event loop exception
Reason:
XPCOM error -2142109678
